sub_title: Regional Sales Manager - MENA Region at SILICON
summary:
During my whole career I have earned many ethics and beliefs , I realized it’s all about talent & motivation these are the main keys of success beside continuous development and learning. As a sales and marketing manager I am learning new skills everyday which completes my technical engineering background.

Building materials are the spirit of any construction project, choosing the right material which reflecting the fine architectural view is the only way to express the efforts of the team of any modern building material manufacturer company.

Technology in Engineering Field is moving very fast especially in building materials, interior design and insulation methods, you can imagine what Building Information Modelling already added to improve any designed project and also our life consequently. one day any client can simply design and implement his requirement with only one click.
